property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to the scenario; the barrier is defeated. If another barrier is next to the scenario, banish 1 of them. When you encounter a villain, choose a type of boon other than loot and draw 3 non-Basic cards of that type from the box. You may choose 1 and put it under this card and banish any not chosen; if you do, the difficulty of checks to defeat the villain is increased by 1d20. If the villain is defeated, add the boon to the scenario rewards; otherwise, banish the boon.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to the scenario; the barrier is defeated. If another barrier is next to the scenario, banish 1 of them. While displayed, before you advance the blessings deck, you may bury a random card from your deck; you may banish that card to not advance the blessings deck this turn. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, each character at your location randomly chooses another character; the chosen character is dealt Combat damage equal to the number of cards that have the Attack trait and weapons in the choosing character's hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Draw 3 non-Basic blessings from the box. You may choose 1 and add it to your hand; banish any not chosen. If you added 1 to your hand, the barrier is undefeated; expend 1d4-1 mythic charges. Otherwise, the barrier is defeated. After you act, banish the barrier.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Draw 3 spells from the box; if the adventure deck number is 5 or higher, instead draw 3 non-Basic, non-Elite spells from the box. You may choose 1 and add it to your hand; banish any not chosen. If you added 1 to your hand, the barrier is undefeated; banish a card that has the Magic trait from your hand or discard pile. Otherwise, the barrier is defeated. After you act, banish this barrier.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Alrys Harnaste is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If the check to defeat does not have the Magic trait, Alrys Harnaste is undefeated. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from; if you do, display this card next to your deck. While displayed, the diffculty of your checks is increased by 2. At the start of your turn, 1 character at your location may succeed at a Divine 9 check to banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you attempt a combat check to defeat, randomly choose 2 characters. Each must expend a mythic charge or be dealt 1d4 Ranged Combat damage. If undefeated, you are dealt 1d4+1 Ranged Combat damage. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Better a dragon on your floor than one on your doorstep." -- Wintersun proverb

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Beverach is immune to the Cold trait. If your check to defeat has the Fire trait, add 1d8. Before you act, each character at your location must succeed at a Dexterity or Acrobatics 10 check or be dealt 1d4-1 Cold damage and cannot move this turn.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: These foul worms are content to chew on the dead.. or those who will be.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each character at your location must succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 8 check or bury 1d4-1 cards from the bottom of his deck. If undefeated, bury the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If the top card of the blessings discard pile has the Corrupted trait, blessings may not be played on checks against the Ivory Templar. If undefeated, before taking damage, recharge your hand and reset it. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "She may be blind, but so is anyone whose head she bites off." -- Zanedra

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Scorizscar is immune to the Acid, Mental, and Poison traits. If your check has the Fire trait, add 1d8. Before you act, each character at your location must attempt a Dexterity or Acrobatics 9 check. Characters who succeed are dealt 2 Acid damage; characters who fail are dealt 1d4+1 Acid damage.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Don't worry about the things that come out of the shadows. Worry about the shadows." -- Spymaster Anevia

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Shadow Demon is immune to the Electricity and Poison traits. If the check to defeat does not have the Magic trait, the Shadow Demon is undefeated. Before you act, if your location has the Abyssal trait, you are dealt 1d4 Cold damage.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Although they might look like gigantic vermin, these highly evolved hunters of demonkind possess ruthless cunning and intelligence.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Armors may not be played during this encounter. If undefeated, bury 1d4+1 random cards from your discard pile.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: These alien entities collect the brains of sentient creatures, trapping them in arrays of bulbous blisters.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each character is dealt 2 Force damage; for each card discarded due to this damage, the difficulty of checks against the Dominion Scientist is increased by 1. Succeed at an Arcane or Divine 12 check or you may not play spells that have the Attack trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Drake Rider is immune to the Electricity and Poison traits. If you succeed at an Intelligence or Knowledge 12 check, or if your check has the Force or Ranged traits, add 5 to your checks to defeat it. If you fail a check to defeat the Drake Rider, you may reroll the dice; take the new result. If you do, the Drake Rider deals 1d4 Combat damage to you, then deals 1d4 Electricity damage to you.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Lost souls coalesce. Eyes twitch. Mouths scream.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Drocha Swarm is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If the check to defeat does not have the Magic trait, the Drocha Swarm is undefeated. If you do not defeat the Drocha Swarm by at least 4, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 9 check or bury 1d4 random cards from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Locust Demon is immune to the Electricity and Poison traits. If you succeed at an Intelligence or Knowledge 11 check, or if your check has the Force trait, add 5 to your checks against it. Before you act, each character at your location must succeed at a Wisdom 9 check or discard the top card of her deck. If undefeated, discard the top card of your deck.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: This lost soul's fragmented memories evoke sorrow, longing, and a vengeful hatred for all living things.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Lost Soul is immune to the Electricity, Mental, and Poison traits. If undefeated, display this card next to your deck. While displayed, discard any cards you draw. At the start of the next turn, banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Mist Horror is immune to the Electricity and Ranged traits. If the check to defeat has the Cold trait, add 1d8, and reduce all damage dealt to you by this monster to 0. If the check to defeat does not have the Magic trait, the Mist Horror is undefeated. After you act, shuffle this card into a random open location, then move to a random location.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Goat-headed schirs are among the most violent and vile-tempered inhabitants of the Abyss.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Spite Demon is immune to the Electricity and Poison traits. Before you act, roll 1d6. On an odd result, a character at your location summons and encounters this adventure's servitor demon.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Toad Demon is immune to the Electricity and Poison traits. If you succeed at an Intelligence or Knowledge 12 check, or if your check to defeat has the Attack or Ranged trait, add 5 to your check to defeat it. Damage dealt by the Toad Demon is dealt to each character at your location. If undefeated, end your turn.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: This construct is an amalgum of protoplasmic flesh and pure chaos.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: You may not play spells that have the Attack trait. Before you act, the Warmonger Wasp deals 1d4 Electricity damage to you. While you act, all damage dealt by the Warmonger Wasp is Poison damage.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: These maletic aberrations feed on the fear of terrified travelers.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: All damage dealt by the Will-o'-Wisp is Electricity damage. You may not play spells that have the Attack trait unless they also have the Force trait. Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom 10 check or recharge 1d4 cards from your hand.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Come out, accursed whelp! We're your friends!" -- Jaruunicka

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 9 check or you may not play spells that have the Attack trait. When you are dealt damage by Jaruunicka, first choose blessings to discard as your damage, if you have any. Then draw as many cards as you discarded and recharge that number of cards.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Mistress Jerribeth assured me that others carried her blood in their veins." -- Marhevok

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, summon and encounter the henchman Beverach. If your check to defeat has the Attack or Ranged trait, the difficulty to defeat Marhevok is increased by 3. If undefeated, Marhevok deals 1d4 Combat damage to each other character at your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Skulgrym is immune to the Electricity and Poison traits. If you are the only character at your location, the difficulty of checks to defeat Skulgrym is increased by 4. Before you act, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 9 check or bury a card. Increase the damage dealt by Skulgrym by your number of buried cards.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "It is one thing to know how the crystals work. It is quite another thing to know why." -- Xanthir Vang

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Xanthir Vang cannot be evaded, and is immune to the Poison trait. When you encounter Xanthir Vang, if there are more than 15 cards in the blessings deck, he immediately escapes as if undefeated. All damage dealt by Xanthir Vang is Poison damage. The difficulty of your checks to defeat the villain is increased by twice your number of mythic charges.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Whatever comes through that portal is something I can use." -- Zanedra

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, a random character at your location must summon and defeat a random monster from the box; otherwise, after the encounter, the villain is undefeated. The difficulty of your checks to defeat Svennarobeth that have the Attack trait is increased by 3.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to ignore a bane's immunity to the Poison trait until the end of the encounter. Discard this card to explore your location. During this exploration, ignore banes' immunity to the Poison trait; add 2 plus the scenario's adventure deck number and the Poison trait to your combat checks.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: To acquire this card, summon and defeat this adventure's servitor demon. Recharge this card to add 1d4 to your Divine or Ranged check. Bury this card to shuffle 1d4+1 random cards from your discard pile into your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: At the start or end of your turn, discard this card to move; add 1d8 to any check required to move. Discard this card to explore your location, or to move to another location and explore it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card to ignore the Corrupted trait on a card until the end of your turn, then recharge this card. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to evade a monster you encounter; if the monster's adventure deck number is lower than the scenario's adventure deck number, you may put the monster on the top or bottom of its location deck. Discard this card to explore your location. Add 1d6 to your first Stealth or combat check during this exploration.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: During your check, if the top card of the blessings discard pile has the Corrupted trait, reveal this card and discard a card to add that blessing to your hand an immediately play it. Reveal this card and discard a card that has the Corrupted trait to explore your location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1d6 and the Fire trait to your combat checks. Recharge this card to reduce Combat or Fire damage dealt to you by 1; you may play another armor on this check. If proficient with heavy armors, you may reveal this card instead of recharging it. If proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: At the end of your turn, bury this card to move. Reveal this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if proficient with light armors, bury it instead. If proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic Elite

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2, or to add 2 to your Ranged combat check or Perception check. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if proficient with light armors, bury it instead. If proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1 and the Piercing trait to your Melee combat check. You may play another armor on this check. Recharge this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 3. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if proficient with heavy armors, bury it instead. If proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to a check. During any character's check, bury this card to allow that character to reroll the dice; use the new result. Discard this card to explore your location. If the top card of the blessings discard pile matches this card, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Arueshalae

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to another character's deck and put a marker on 1 of the traits below. When you add this card to your hand, remove any markers on it. [ ] Strength [ ] Dexterity [ ] Constitution [ ] Intelligence [ ] Wisdom [ ] Charisma

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to explore your location. Add 1d8 to your checks to acquire during this exploration; if you succeed at such a check, put this card on top of a random character's deck. While displayed, after the end of any character's turn, if the top card of the blessings discard pile does not have the Corrupted trait, that character discards a card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to explore your location. Add 1d8 to your checks to defeat during this exploration; if you succeed at such a check, put this card on top of a random character's deck. While displayed, after the end of any character's turn, if the top card of the blessings discard pile has the Corrupted trait, that character buries a random card from his discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you have 1 or more mythic charges, put this card on top of your deck to add 1d4 plus your number of charges and this card's traits to your combat check that has the Bow trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card and reveal a blessing to add your number of mythic charges to your Arcane or Divine check; then, if the revealed blessing had the Corrupted trait, expend a charge. Discard this card to draw a random blessing from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Banish an Item

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to evade a bane you encounter that has the Outsider or Undead trait. Banish this card to add 2d12 to your check to defeat a bane that has the Outsider or Undead trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card to put a spell from your hand faceup on this card. You may bury this card to put the spell in your hand. When you would bury this card for its power, you may succeed at a Craft 12 check to recharge it instead of burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce all damage dealt by a bane you encounter that has the Swarm or Vermin trait to 1. When you encounter a monster, banish this card to add 2d6 to any checks against that monster; if that monster has the Swarm or Vermin trait, add another 2d6.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you attempt a Divine check against a monster, bury this card to get a mythic charge. After playing this card, you may succeed at a Divine 16 check to recharge this card instead of burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Remove this card from the game to gain an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma skill feat. After playing this card, you may succeed at a Knowledge 30 check to banish this card instead of removing it from the game.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 2 to your Arcane or Divine checks, or to reduce damage dealt to you by 2; you may play another item on the check. Discard this card to put a spell from your discard pile on top of your deck. After you play this card, if it has the Corrupted trait, bury a random card from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d12+1; you may additionally discard this card to add your Strength die. You may recharge a card that has the Torag trait to add another 1d8. If not proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. You may discard this card to examine the top card of your location deck; if it does not have the Demon trait, shuffle your location deck.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Arueshalae

property.name: Attr1
property.value: During your move step, reveal this card and discard a card that has the Desna trait or a spell to allow any number of characters at your location to move; ignore movement restrictions. Reveal this card and recharge a card that has the Desna trait or a spell to ignore a location's trait until the end of the turn.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Arueshalae

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill plus your Strength die + 3; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d8 and ignore the bane's immunities for your check. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If you are proficient with weapons, you may discard this card to add 1d4 plus the number of cards that have the Desna trait in your hand to any combat check at another location.

property.name: Owner
property.value: Owner: Arueshalae

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1 to your non-combat check. When a character at your location plays a boon that has the Desna trait on a check, recharge this card to add 1 die to that check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to use your Arcane skill + 2d6. Discard this card to evade a monster you encounter whose highest difficulty to defeat is 20 or lower; you may bury this card to put the evaded monster on the bottom of its location deck. After playing this card, if you do not have the Arcane skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane 10 check to recharge this card instead of discarding or burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card. While displayed, you may add 1d8 and the Fire or Cold trait to a combat check attempted by a character at your location. At the end of your turn, if you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card; otherwise, you may attempt an Arcane 12 check. If you succeed, recharge this card; if you fail, discard this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to use your Intelligence, Arcane, or Melee skill + 2d6+1 and add the Acid, Electricity, or Fire trait. If proficient with weapons and you would fail this check, you may ignore the result and evade the bane instead. After playing this card, if you do not have the Arcane skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane 12 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to use your Arcane or Divine skill + 3d6. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane 12 or Divine 14 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to another character card. While displayed, before that character acts in an encounter, you may discard this card to move to that character's location. After discarding this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane 15 or Divine 11 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to allow a character that has fewer mythic charges than the scenario's adventure deck number to get 1 charge. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, if you would discard it, you may succeed at an Arcane or Divine 13 check to recharge it instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When a character at your location defeats a monster that is not immune to the Attack trait, display this card next to your deck to add 1d4 to your checks while displayed. At the end of the scenario, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d8+2; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d12 and the Poison trait. Display this card. While displayed, add 1d12 and the Poison trait to your combat checks. At the end of the turn, discard this card; if this card has the Corrupted trait, you are dealt 1d4+1 Poison damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d6+2; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d8 plus the scenario's adventure deck number. If not proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If you succeed at your first check to defeat a bane that requires sequential checks to defeat, the difficulty of checks to defeat during this encounter is decreased by 5.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d8+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 2d6 and the Electricity trait. If not proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. On this check, you may reveal a card that has the Mount trait to ignore the 2-Handed trait on this card; if you do, and this is your first combat check of the turn, add another 1d8+1.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d8 plus the scenario's adventure deck number; you may additionally recharge this card to add another 1d6+2. If proficient with weapons, discard this card to add 1d4+2 to a combat check by a character at another location; then you may additionally expend a mythic charge to move to that location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d4+2; you may additionally recharge this card to add another 2d4 and the Force trait. If a monster has an effect that increases the difficulty of the check, ignore that effect. When playing another weapon or spell, you may discard this card to add 1d4+1 and the Force trait to your combat check.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Weapon: 4 [ ] 5 Spell: - [ ] 1 Armor: 1 [ ] 2 Item: 3 [ ] 4 [ ] 5 Ally: 2 [ ] 3 [ ] 4 Blessing: 5 [ ] 6 [ ] 7 [ ] 8

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Arueshalae's Gift

property.name: Flavour
property.value: If being bad is wrong, succubi don't want to be right.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Electricity, Fire, and Poison damage dealt to you is reduced by 3 ([ ] 5). You may evade your encounter ([ ] then if it is your turn, you may move). When the cohort Arueshalae's Gift is displayed next to a character's deck, add 1d4 ([ ] +1) ([ ] +2) to his checks that use the marked skill. At the start of your ([ ] or any) turn, you may add Arueshalae's Gift to your hand. [ ] When you defeat a monster, you may recharge ([ ] or reveal) a card that has the Corrupted trait to recharge a random card from your discard pile. [ ] When another character fails a check to acquire an ally, you may discard ([ ] or recharge) a card to automatically acquire that ally. [ ] When you play a card, you may ignore the Corrupted trait on any card ([ ] and you may treat the top card of the blessings discard pile as if it has the Corrupted trait).

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Strength d6 [ ] +1 Dexterity d8 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 [ ] +4 Ranged: Dexterity +2 Disable: Dexterity +2 Constitution d6 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 Intelligence d6 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Wisdom d4 [ ] +1 Charisma d12 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 [ ] +4 Knowledge: Charisma +1 Diplomacy: Charisma +3

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Light Armors, Weapons

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Weapon: 4 [ ] 5 Spell: - [ ] 1 Armor: 1 [ ] 2 Item: 3 [ ] 4 [ ] 5 Ally: 2 [ ] 3 [ ] 4 Blessing: 5 [ ] 6 [ ] 7 [ ] 8

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Arueshalae's Gift

property.name: Flavour
property.value: No one knows how powerful temptations can be better than a succubus redeemed.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Electricity, Fire, and Poison damage dealt to you is reduced by 3 ([ ] 5). You may evade your encounter ([ ] then if it is your turn, you may move). When the cohort Arueshalae's Gift is displayed next to a character's deck, add 1d4 ([ ] +1) ([ ] +2) to his checks that use the marked skill. At the start of your ([ ] or any) turn, you may add Arueshalae's Gift to your hand. [ ] Instead of your first exploration on a turn, you may reveal a card that has the Desna trait or a blessing to choose a character at your location. Shuffle 1d4+1 ([ ] +2) random cards from his discard pile into his deck, then discard the card you revealed ([ ] and that character may draw a card). [ ] At the start of your turn you may examine the top card of your location deck. If it is a boon, ([ ] you may) put it on the bottom of the deck.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Strength d6 [ ] +1 Dexterity d8 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 [ ] +4 Ranged: Dexterity +2 Disable: Dexterity +2 Constitution d6 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 Intelligence d6 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Wisdom d4 [ ] +1 Charisma d12 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 [ ] +4 Knowledge: Charisma +1 Diplomacy: Charisma +3

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Light Armors, Weapons

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Weapon: 4 [ ] 5 Spell: - [ ] 1 Armor: 1 [ ] 2 Item: 3 [ ] 4 [ ] 5 Ally: 2 [ ] 3 [ ] 4 Blessing: 5 [ ] 6 [ ] 7 [ ] 8

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Arueshalae's Gift

property.name: Flavour
property.value: After tempting a priestess, Arushalae gained the forbidden power to dearm, and Desna opened her eyes. Struggling to stay on the straight and narrow, this succubus fled to the Worldwound and the rest of the Abyss followed after her. Trapped in the Demon's Redoubt, beset by demons and crusaders alike, Arueshalae seeks allies that can guide her on her chosen path. With luck, she will not betray their trust.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Electricity, Fire, and Poison damage dealt to you is reduced by 3 ([ ] 5). You may evade your encounter ([ ] then if it is your turn, you may move). When the cohort Arueshalae's Gift is displayed next to a character's deck, add 1d4 ([ ] +1) to his checks that use a marked skill. At the start of your turn, you may add Arueshalae's Gift to your hand.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Strength d6 [ ] +1 Dexterity d8 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 [ ] +4 Ranged: Dexterity +2 Disable: Dexterity +2 Constitution d6 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 Intelligence d6 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 Wisdom d4 [ ] +1 Charisma d12 [ ] +1 [ ] +2 [ ] +3 [ ] +4 Knowledge: Charisma +1 Diplomacy: Charisma +3

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Light Armors, Weapons

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 2 Weapon 0 Spell 1 Armor 1 Item 1 Ally 1 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you encounter a boon, draw a boon of that type from the box; you may encounter it instead. Banish the boon you did not encounter.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Banish a weapon.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, draw a random blessing that has the Corrupted trait from the box.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Within their Ivory Sanctum, corrupt templars meditate and show obeisance to a massive statue of Baphomet. Horned demons guard the heart of the temple, where an arsenal of weapons wait for the fanatics who will wield them. There are demons here of all sorts, some mostly humanoid, and some more alien. If this is a true cathedral, nothing holy is ever worshipped here.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 1 Weapon 2 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 1 Ally 1 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: All monsters gain the Demon trait and are immune to the Electricity and Poison traits.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Summon and defeat this adventure's servitor demon.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: This fortress is a ruined remnant of its former glory. Eagle Rock stood as a bastion of defiance throughout the Second and Third Crusades. In the Fourth Crusade, the fortress fell after a long and harrowing siege. Now five ruined towers reach towards the heavens, grasping only empty air. Passing travelers may notice a remnant of what this place once aspired to be: the face of the rocky cliff almost looks like the profile of a bird of prey.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 0 Weapon 0 Spell 1 Armor 1 Item 0 Ally 2 Blessing 2

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you encounter a non-villain monster that has the Demon trait, banish it.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at an Intelligence or Wisdom 7 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: If you win the scenario, a player may begin playing the character Arueshalae, who chooses a mythic path card and gains the same number of each type of feat that another character has gained.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Beseiged by demons, the succubus Arueshalae fled to the tallest tower of her redoubt, where she activated the warding incantations of the legendary Bell of Mercy. Trapped, she awaited heroes who could liberate her from her self-imposed imprisonment.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: If you win the scenario, a player may begin playing the character Arueshalae, who chooses a mythic path card and gains the same number of each type of feat that another character has gained.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 0 Weapon 2 Spell 1 Armor 1 Item 1 Ally 2 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Bury a boon to add 1d8 to your Strength or Melee check.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Summon and defeat the henchman Bevarach.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, draw a random non-Basic weapon from the box.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The ancestral home of the descendents of Corag Grunhuld-Wintersun has fallen into despair and disrepair. The adults here carry on their work with a tired, haunted expression or stare at strangers warily. The children are silent and solemn. There is nothing carefree or light in this place.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 0 Weapon 2 Spell 1 Armor 1 Item 1 Ally 1 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you acquire a boon, summon and encounter the henchman Scorizscar; you may banish 2 cards to evade her.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Summon and defeat the henchman Scorizscar.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Before you reset your hand, summon and encounter a random item from the box, then summon and encounter the henchman Scorizscar.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: One of the major rivers of old Sarkoris is now a dry riverbed, occasionally disturbed by rivulets of molten lava seeping from the Abyss. Travelers speak in hushed rumors of Scorizscar, a woundwyrm who uses this wasteland as her hunting grounds.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Before you reset your hand, summon and encounter a random item from the box, then summon and encounter the henchman Scorizscar.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Queen Galfrey's army is on the march, Drezen has been retaken, and the Fifth Crusade has begun. Throughout the Worldwound, pockets of information about the demons' influence must be sought. You've learned that the conjurer Xanthir Vang is making something dark: a Nahyndrian elixir that can bestow mythic power to a creature of the Abyss. Surely that would lead to the ruin of all, so you must seek its source. To vanquish the greatest evildoers, you may need to find an evildoer you can trust. Could such a thing exist?

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Crusader's Legacy The Demon's Redoubt The Fallen Fane Wintersun The Ivory Sanctum

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Each character chooses a role card and gains a power feat.

property.name: Attr3
property.value:
Complete the first four listed scenarios in any order, then complete The Ivory Sanctum.
The servitor demon is the henchman Shadow Demon.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The ghost town of Sesker's Gully is the resting place of the fallen crusader Alrys Harnaste. But what does "rest" mean in the Worldwound? Alrys died mere feet from his family crypt, and has ranged for centuries against this injustice. The demon Skulgrym finds this amusing, chasing Alrys's spirit around the Gully. Time to set things right.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Cell Family Tomb Forsaken Cloister Wounded Lands Cemetery Abyssal River Dark Forest Befouled Altar

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Cohorts: Aron Kir, Horgus Gwerm

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you would banish a Wight henchman from a location deck, display it next to this scenario instead. When you encounter an ally, if a Wight is displayed, banish the ally and summon and encounter a Wight instead. When you defeat Alrys Harnaste, shuffle him into a random open location deck.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Alrys Harnaste Wights

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a card feat. One character may redeem a card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Outside a collapsed castle, the demonic allies of the hag Jaruunicka impatiently wait for the spirit of one of their own to break. Inside hides the succubus Arueshalae, who has committed the ultimate heresy of wanting to be something else. Demons don't get second chances often, for good reasons. But good reasons are exactly why you're here.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Cell Guardpost Citadel Befouled Altar Collapsing Bridge Dark Forest Molten Pool

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Cohorts: Irabeth Tirabade, Sosiel Vaenic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: After you build location decks, put a Grimslake henchman on top of each one. After closing 2 locations, summon and build the location Tower of the Fourth Sphere.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Spherewalker Staff, Starbow, Swallowtail Bracers

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Up and down the Worldwound, shrines have been perverted by minions of the horned god Baphomet. One such place is the Fallen Fane, where the demon summon Zanedra aims to bring something potent into this realm. Wise Queen Galfrey has advised you, "Let us not expect anything good to come out of a shrine to Baphomet."

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Abyssal Rift Befouled Altar Canyon Abyssal River Abattoir Cavern Armory Guardpost

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Cohorts: Aravashnial, Anevia Tirabade

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter a henchman or villain in a location that has the Abyssal trait, succeed at an Intelligence or Knowledge 9 check or evade your encounter and move to a random location that does not have the Abyssal trait.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Zanedra and Svennarobeth

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Ivory Templars

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a skill feat. One character may redeem a card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: There is nothing unified about the forces of chaos. They snap at each other just as much as they plague the innocent. In the Ivory Sanctum, either the transformed treachery demon Jerribeth or the fly demon Grillixbee might betray their master, the worm that walks known as Xanthir Vang. That doesn't mean they won't betray you as well.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Cathedral of Chaos Cell Sanctum Laboratory Eagle Rock Cavern Great Hall Sacristy

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When the first location is closed, summon the cohorts Grillixbee and Jerribeth. Add 1 to a character's hand and display the other next to the scenario.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Xanthir Vang

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Ivory Templars

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Black Robe, Fiendsplitter

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Many fled when the Worldwound splayed open Sarkoris. Not so the Wintersun barbarians, who would not be driven from their homes. But years of resisting hellacious attacks have allowed demonic traits to manifest in some of the Wintersun clan, most notably the clanliege Marhevok. Has their lineage been lost, or can their loyalty be reclaimed?

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Eagle Rock Wintersun Hall Woundwyrm's Lair Marketplace Armory Guardpost Mongrel Village Canyon

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Cohorts: Cecilla the Uprooter, Vinst

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you defeat a henchman by 7 or more, and you immediately attempt to close its location, add 1d8 to your check to defeat or acquire a card summoned when closing.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Marhevok Wintersun

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Barbarian Hordes

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a power feat.
